projects.name: Banking Web
projects.desc: This project was built using Vue JS, which is also my first project using Vue Js. I got the UI design for this project from uidesign.to.

projects.name: dDesign Web
projects.desc: This project was built with Vanilla JS. This website is a gallery that displays my friend's works.

projects.name: Bookshelf
projects.desc: This project was built with Vanilla JS. This project is a submission project for the Beginner Level Web Front-End class in Dicoding. With this project I graduated to intermediate level.

projects.name: Todays Meals Web
projects.desc: This project was built using Web Components. This project is a submission project for the Intermediate Web Front-End class at Dicoding, and with this project I graduated to the expert level.

projects.name: Node JS Authentication API
projects.desc: This project is a simple Back-End project to create an authentication on the web.

projects.name: Multer x Sharp
projects.desc: This project was built with a combination of Multer and Sharp which aims to resize the original image input from the client side and store it on the server.
